title: 6 best calamine lotions to get rid of skin irritation
text:
Our skin is constantly exposed to dust, dirt, and sunburn – all of which can cause several skin problems. On top of that, the constant use of cosmetic products can also lead to skin irritation, itching, pain, and discomfort. Therefore, it is important to maintain the health of our skin. Though there are several home remedies, like turmeric and aloe vera that help soothe these skin problems, there are several products available in the market that can help you get rid of skin discomfort. And one of them is calamine lotion, which has cooling and soothing properties. Before we delve into the best calamine lotion to get rid of skin irritation, it is important to understand its benefits.
Whether you are suffering from skin itching or irritation, calamine lotion is the one stop solution to get rid of all that. Here are some of the best calamine lotions in India that you can add to your skincare routine:
This calamine lotion from GLIMLACH Calamine is one of the best calamine lotions for itching. It provides protection to your skin from itching and rashes that occur due to allergic reactions, insect bites, heat and chicken pox. Zinc oxide, ferric oxide, aloe vera and castor oil are some of the ingredients used in this lotion that helps soothe down your skin. The brand claims that the product is 100 percent gluten free and dermatologically recommended, which makes it safer for you to use.

Additionally, calamine and aloe vera works effectively on acne scars, sunburns and deeply nourishes your skin, making it shinier and healthier. Getting irritated or itchy skin is a common phenomenon today as we constantly get exposed to several allergic substances. Your skin needs an equal amount of care as other parts of your body. Therefore, you must incorporate some of the best calamine lotion in your skincare routine to relieve skin irritation. Here are the benefits of calamine lotion for skin irritation:
The constant exposure to cosmetics, dirt, dust and hormonal imbalance can lead to acne. Incorporating calamine lotion in your skin care routine for acne prone skin is the best solution. It helps treat acne and it also prevents acne scars and spots. The skin-drying property of this lotion makes it the best for preventing acne irritation.
You can also use calamine lotion for dry skin because it reduces dryness. Additionally, it keeps your skin hydrated and moisturised.
Skin pigmentation is a common problem that affects many people. Calamine lotions have properties that can reduce pigmentation and
even out your skin tone.
If you are prone to getting sunburns, this lotion might be able to help you. It is important to treat your skin with care to get rid of sunburns. And it contains cooling and soothing properties that can help you.
Calamine lotion can even help prevent itchiness and skin irritation caused by chicken pox or insect bites.
